<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_83068_cisco_lab.CheckMemberofGroup</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>CheckMemberofGroup</name><script><![CDATA[var CheckMemberofGroup = Class.create();
CheckMemberofGroup.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

checkIsMember: function(){
var user1 = this.getParameter('sysparm_user'); 
gs.addInfoMessage(user1);
var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
gr.addQuery('group','c587cbee1b605814c695fc88cc4bcb41');
gr.addQuery('user',user1);
gr.query();
if(gr.next())
{
return "true";
}
else
{
return "false";
}
},
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-17 16:37:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>4be760561bbc1410c695fc88cc4bcbd7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CheckMemberofGroup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco Lab of the Future" source="x_83068_cisco_lab">fe07f0fa1bf78c50c695fc88cc4bcbbc</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Cisco Lab of the Future">fe07f0fa1bf78c50c695fc88cc4bcbbc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4be760561bbc1410c695fc88cc4bcbd7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-17 16:37:58</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
